review: I like this device a lot! However, i have experienced some connection issues lately. My internet/wifi has no issues on my phone, laptop etc. but when I try streaming a movie through my phone on my tv, i have to disconnect the chromecast and reset it. I experienced the same when attempting to stream a video on Youtube. its a bit of an inconvenience. It will start to lag and then it'll stop. No issues with other apps like Netflix or pandora. I give it 3 stars for the lagging and having to reset it often.
